original_title: Sri Lanka’s cost recovery measures on electricity & fuel pricing to continue throughout IMF programme
original_body_lines: The cost recovery measures on both electricity and fuel pricing are expected to be continued throughout the four-year IMF programme, says Sarwat Jahan, the IMF Resident Representative in Sri Lanka.
She made this remark during the special media briefing held with the IMF staff team visiting Sri Lanka this evening (May 15).
